about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Silver Touch Technologies Limited is Ahmadabad based provider of end-to-end Information and Communication Technology (ICT) solution. Company has executed projects in India and aboard.

Silver Touch provides a wide range of services relating to IT requirements of its clients. Some of the services offered by the company are as under:

1. eGovernance Services
2. Software Services including Application Development, Support and Maintenance
3. System Integration Services
4. SAP Services
5. Social Media Marketing Services
6. Mobile Application Services

As on July 31, 2017, Company has 1042 employees on the payroll. In addition, there were 192 contract labors for the month July, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the Silver Touch IPO?
faqs.answer:
Silver Touch IPO is a SME IPO of 3324000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹40.22 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹121 per share. The minimum order quantity is .

The IPO opens on November 20, 2017, and closes on November 23, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Silver Touch IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Silver Touch IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Silver Touch IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Silver Touch IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Silver Touch IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Silver Touch IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Silver Touch IPO opens on November 20, 2017 and closes on November 23, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Silver Touch IPO?
faqs.answer: Silver Touch IPO lot size and the minimum order quantity is not available at this time. Please check again later.

faqs.question: How to apply for Silver Touch IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Silver Touch IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
